column1: Ciconia ciconia;White stork;This bird often nests in the vicinity of human buildings - on barns
column4: individuals form pairs. Both the male and the female take part in the rearing of chicks. At the end of the summer
column5: they gather to set off together on a journey to Africa. The stork's diet consists of small mammals
column8: earthworms and sometimes other birds as well.;LC;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/22697691/86248677
